import numpy as np
import tensorflow as tf

# Load the model for crop disease and pest identification
model = tf.keras.models.load_model('crop_disease_pest_detection.h5')

# Define a function to detect and classify crop diseases and pests using AR
def detect_disease_pest(image):
    # Preprocess the image
    img = cv2.resize(image, (224, 224))
    img = np.expand_dims(img, axis=0)
    img = img/255.0

    # Use the model to predict the class of the image
    prediction = model.predict(img)
    class_index = np.argmax(prediction)
    class_names = ['disease1', 'disease2', 'pest1', 'pest2']
    class_name = class_names[class_index]
